The correct chronological order is: 
1. He greets "all you freaks" before the shredding begins. (0:00 - 0:17)
2. Close-up on his hands while he explains bending on the B string to match another finger. (0:19 - 1:08)
3. The on-screen text "LICK 1" appears as he talks about putting the index finger on the target note. (1:00 - 1:33)
4. He says he'll "take this further" and demonstrates another double-stop that squeals. (1:30 - 2:30)
5. He explains a tiny pre-bend on the B string to make the note out of pitch, then plays the horrible sound. (2:32 - 3:30)
6. He describes pre-bending, plucking, damping, then bending up to pitch, and calls it "really crazy sounding stuff." (3:33 - 6:00)

Therefore, the correct answer is A: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 6 -> 5.

The correct chronological order is: 
2 -> 1 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6
Option A correctly orders the events based on the sequence of on-screen labels, visual cues, and spoken descriptions.
